Title: Beer Bad
Plot: Still trying to come to terms with Parker's womanising, Buffy starts to hang out at the college bar where she and a group of upperclass students really regress when they start drinking a 'special' beer.
GuestStars: Kate Luhr, Cameron Bender, Steven Jang, Kaycee Shank, Patrick Belton, Joshua Wheeler, Lisa Johnson, Bryan Cuprill, Jake Phillips, Kal Penn, Michael Beardsley, Eric Matheny, Stephen M. Porter, Paige Moss, Marc Bluca
